channel.title: How do i make a new shop?
channel.description: Alright, can anyone please give me a step-by-step process to add an NPC in Varrock, that can sell things. Along with that, how do I add the store itself?

item.title: How do i make a new shop?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

spawn NPCs in autospawn.cfg Use the WanneShop coding in client.java and then make shop correspon with WanneShop in shops.cfg

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new shop?
